Package mf

Class MessageBusFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • mf.MessageBusFactory
  • public class MessageBusFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory used for configuring and creating a messaging bus. It advised to set all values before creating a MessageBus object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MessageBusFactory()
      Constructor for a MessageBusFactory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageBusFactory

        public MessageBusFactory()
        Constructor for a MessageBusFactory. Initializes all configuration values with default variables.

    • Method Detail

      • setIdentifier

        public void setIdentifier​(java.lang.String identifier)
        Setter for the variable identifier. The identifier should be a unique string identifying a message bus / application.
        Parameters:
        identifier - Unique identifier used by the message bus

      • setInitialTimeToLive

        public void setInitialTimeToLive​(int initialTimeToLive)
        Setter for the time to live parameter. This should be set to the maximal amount of hops a message could need from one point to the receiver.
        Parameters:
        initialTimeToLive - Time to live parameter

      • setMessageCapacity

        public void setMessageCapacity​(int messageCapacity)
        Setter for the message capacity. This can be set to the maximal amount of messages the framework stores, if messages are received simultaneously. Keep the default value, if you are not sure about the configuration! Setting a too low value can result in lost messages.
        Parameters:
        messageCapacity - The amount of messages stored internally

      • setServerPort

        public void setServerPort​(int serverPort)
        Setter for the server port. Defines the port to which the message bus will listen for incoming messages.
        Parameters:
        serverPort - Port number of the message bus

      • setForwardsMessages

        public void setForwardsMessages​(boolean forwardsMessages)
        Setter for the boolean defining whether this application should forward incoming messages to peers.
        Parameters:
        forwardsMessages - This application forwards incoming messages to others.

      • addMessageHandler

        public void addMessageHandler​(MessageHandler handler)
        Message handlers can be added

      • create

        public MessageBus create()
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a configured message bus object. This method should be called, after all parameters are correctly set.
        Returns:
        Message bus object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the message bus could not be created, because the network configuration is invalid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the Identifier is not allowed
